author: thomreis
body:
To make the L1T offline DQM work for the pp reference run the trigger paths used must be adapted for the pp reference run HLT menu.

This PR includes commit https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21122/commits/6be5e63e80d043519f48e937d92d5d61e2f87bae from PR #21122 to get the era "Run2_2017_ppRef".
title: L1T offine DQM changes for pp reference run
